channel.title: A Talk about Forum Mafia in general
channel.description: ## Greetings, fellow players and spectators. :male_detective: As you know (or not), Forum Matches were around from quite a long time here. I'm wondering what type of games are enjoying the most or do you maybe attached to specific gamemode or style. Do you recall any previous games from any reasons or you're just treating like any other game? Either way i'm leaving this poll for ya. You can pick more than one choice. [poll type=multiple min=1 max=4 public=true] * Mountanous (Town vs Mafia) * Typical Mafia but with some innovations (Power Roles / Mechanics) * Multiball (A battle between at least 3 Factions) * Rolemadness (Game where all roles do something) * Game with Themes (Usually wacky Rolemadness with unusual role cards and mechanics) * Others (Please post it in comment section) [/poll]
